DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate compliance patient ' satisfaction mono combination treatment Candesartan cilexetil ( Atacand ) / Candesartan cilexetil 16mg , hydrochlorothiazide 12.5mg ( Atacand plus ) hypertension .
DOC.brief_title: COmpliance Efficacy Mono Combination Tablet Study ATacand/Atacand Plus
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients consent participation/data release study 2 . Patients diagnosed hypertension prescribe atacand/atacand plus physician base clinical decision 1 . Secondary hypertension require therapy antihypertensive medication 2 . Patients prescribed atacand/atacand plus base safety reason reason determine physician 3 . Women pregnancy lactation 4 . Patients enrol study
